General.Name: Guilin Fuda Co Ltd
General.Description: GUILIN FUDA Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells auto parts and components in China. Its products include engine crankshafts, automobile clutches, spiral bevel gears, precision forgings, and bolts for use in the non-road machinery and high-end machinery manufacturing fields, such as automobile, marine, nuclear power, construction machinery, and agricultural machinery. The company is based in Guilin, China. GUILIN FUDA Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guilin fuda group co., LTD.
